de.tbosch.aufzugseile.gui.aufzug
Class Element

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              de.tbosch.aufzugseile.gui.aufzug.Element
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoppelUmlenkrolle, EndElement, Rolle, Seilaufhaenger
public class Element
extends javax.swing.JComponent

The element class. All elements of the elevator are implementet over this class. Moving, dragging are also implemented as popupmenus and scaling.

Author:
Thomas Bosch (tbosch@gmx.de)
See Also:
Serialized Form

               double xscale,
               double yscale,
               java.lang.String iconpath,
               Aufzugschacht aufzugschacht)
Creates a new instance of Element.

Parameters:
scale - The scale of width and heigth
iconpath - The path of the icon
height - Height
aufzugschacht - The elevator itself
width - Width
seilx - Relative x-coordinates of rope-clipping-point
yscale - The scale of y-coordinates
seily - Relative y-coordinates of rope-clipping-point
xscale - The scale of x-coordinates
y - y-position
x - x-position
